PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.label: corpus familiarization
PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.description: Study of preexisting recorded knowledge, such as schematics or techprints.

PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.label: prototyping
PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.description: Construction of prototypes. Prototypes take much longer to produce and are typically of lower quality due to their experimental nature. The researcher will require both research skill as well as the product's applicable work skill.

PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.label: clinical
PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.description: Experimental treatments and medicine. Experimental treatments are riskier and require skilled surgeons that are also capable of research.

PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.label: tooling
PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.description: Analysis of tools used in the production of the researched products.

PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.label: reverse engineering
PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.description: Reverse engineering of existing sample products.

PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.label: production experience
PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.description: Gathering experience from products with an already known production process.

PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.label: biology
PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.description: Analysis of biological samples, such as plant cuttings or seeds.

PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.label: chemistry
PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.description: Analysis of chemical samples, such as pharmaceuticals or other drugs.

PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.label: gastronomy
PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.description: Analysis of edible ingredients or meals.

PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.label: material studies
PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.description: Studies of viability of possible raw materials used in construction or production.

PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.label: information exchange
PeteTimesSix.ResearchReinvented.Defs.Res.description: Knowledge gained from social interactions between your faction members and members of other factions.
